snippet: The only commitment Europe has made was an idea floated way back in October. And the signs from capitals across the Continent and Britain are that France's allies will not go further.
abstract: The only commitment Europe has made was an idea floated way back in October. And the signs from capitals across the Continent and Britain are that France's allies will not go further.

headline.main: How Far Will Europeans Support France's Counter-Jihad?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
